resources.string:
Expiry Tracker helps you keep track of your food items, medicines, and other products with expiration dates.

Key features:
 • Add items manually with their expiry dates
 • Scan barcodes to add items (Premium feature)
 • Get notified before items expire
 • Customize notification timing and frequency
 • View items sorted by expiration date
 • See alerts for items expiring in 5 days or less

Never waste money or resources again due to expired products!
